Name: Snake Plant
Description: The snake plant is a great air purifier and is easy to take care of. It is a great plant for beginners.

Name: Aloe Vera
Description: Aloe Vera is known for its medicinal properties and is easy to grow indoors.

Name: Spider Plant
Description: Spider plants are great for improving indoor air quality and are very low maintenance.

Name: Peace Lily
Description: Peace lilies are beautiful and help to filter indoor air pollutants.

Name: Orchid
Description: Orchids are elegant flowers that come in a variety of colors and are perfect for adding a touch of beauty to any room.

Name: Tulip
Description: Tulips are vibrant and colorful flowers that are perfect for springtime decoration.

Name: Jade Plant
Description: Jade plants are succulents that are easy to care for and are believed to bring good luck.

Name: Lavender
Description: Lavender is known for its soothing fragrance and beautiful purple flowers.
